A black spear is a two-handed melee weapon requiring 10 Attack to wield. Black spears are obtained as a gift from turning vampyre Juvinates into humans or from looting Shades of Mort'ton minigame chests in the Shade Catacombs.

As with all black and white equipment, the black spear cannot be made from raw materials using the Smithing skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The spear's attack speed has been decreased from 6 (every 3.6 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Black spear(+)" to "Black spear(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Black spear(s)" to "Black spear(p++)".
17 May 2005
(update)

The item was made obtainable.

21 – 29 March 2005

The item was added to the game cache.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There is no white spear, making the black spear one of a few pieces of black equipment with no white counterpart.

A '''black spear''' is a two-handed [[melee]] [[weapon]] requiring 10 [[Attack]] to wield. Black spears are obtained as a gift from turning [[vampyre Juvinate]]s into [[human]]s or from looting [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton]] [[minigame]] chests in the [[Shade Catacombs]].

As with all [[Black equipment|black]] and [[white equipment]], the black spear cannot be made from raw materials using the [[Smithing]] skill.
